title: Frankenstein Unabridged Audiobook
description:
Frankenstein (Mysteries/Sci-Fi) Unabridged Audiobook
by Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley (Author)
Narrated by Ralph Cosham

Product Details
    Series: Mysteries/Sci-Fi
    Audiobook
    Publisher: In Audio (June 30, 2002)
    Language: English
    ISBN-10: 1584722525
    ISBN-13: 978-1584722526


Often inaccurately portrayed in movies, this story of a man creating man is a fascinating thriller.


About the Author
Mary (Wollstonecraft) Shelley was brought up by her father and stepmother as her mother died a few days after delivering her in 1797. At the age of 16 she ran away to France and Switzerland with the poet Percy Shelley. She married him in 1816 after his wife committed suicide by drowning.
